        def __init__(self, fullname, path):
            ig_obj.create_edge(self.fullname)  # ig_obj is from closure
            # ...
    return CustomLoader","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"488a5153-aca2-43a6-8a15-30696d860064","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Why a Factory?","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"736f1058-66ac-4397-b2a7-ca502ec4427d","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Python's import system doesn't allow passing custom parameters to loaders.
